Title: regexpQuoteMeta
Description: Adds a backslash before these characters with special meaning in regular expressions: \0, \\, |, (, ), ^, $, ., [, ], ?, *, +, {, :, -.

This implementation slightly differs from re2::RE2::QuoteMeta. It escapes zero byte as \0 instead of \x00 and it escapes only required characters.
For more information, see RE2
